name: ApplyEntityFrameworkMigrationsWithMigrate
description: Apply Entity Framework migrations using migrate.exe
author: Tobania
helpMarkDown: Uses the provided migrate.exe to apply migrations on a database

inputs.name: WorkingFolder
inputs.label: Working directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The root folder from wich to work. This folder should contain migrate.exe and the bin folder which contains the Entity Framework dll and the dll containing the migrations and the configuration file with connection string.

inputs.name: BinFolder
inputs.label: Binaries folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: The folder containing the binaries (EntityFramework.dll and your DLL with the migrations). This folder should be relative to the working folder above!

inputs.name: MigrateExeFolder
inputs.label: Migrate folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: The folder containing migrate.exe, relative to the working folder above

inputs.name: ConfigurationFile
inputs.label: Configuration file
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Web.config or app.config containing the connection string to use

inputs.name: TargetAssembly
inputs.label: Target assembly
inputs.helpMarkDown: The **filename** of the assembly containing the migrations.

inputs.name: TargetDbContextConfiguration
inputs.label: DbContext configuration
inputs.helpMarkDown: The namespace and name of the migrations configuration you wish to execute, in case of multiple DbContexts
